website_summaries.verdict: A poncho that will last more than one use that offers good coverage and is more fitted than other ponchos.
pros: Drawstring hood helps keep your head dry in the rain
Holds up well for many uses
Can fold up small when not in use
Covers well compared to the poncho style
cons: Not made with a lot of extra room, and not wide enough to cover a backpack

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding solution to overall dryness.
customer_reviews.text: We wore them in Scotland during some wet weather. They were perfect; much better than tradition rain ponchos or jackets. Easy to fold up in to a tight package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had a small hole, but works just fine.
customer_reviews.text: So I got the item way sooner than expected, loved that. But as I opened the purple item it had a small tear towards the bottom. It is very thin but I think for what I'll be using it, it should be fine. I'll update for the actual wear and durability. UPDATE: So we weren't affected too badly from Harvey. I wore it from the house to my neighbors and for errands around town. It is light which to me is a plus but I was scared to rip it so I was a bit gentle with it. It works just fine and the little hole at the bottom didn't affect it.
customer_reviews.author: vic

customer_reviews.title: Did what they were intended to do and better quality that the cheap pullover ponchos
customer_reviews.text: Did what they were intended to do and better quality that the cheap pullover ponchos. We experienced a very rainy camping trip and these ponchos were the only ones that last the whole weekend. Everyone else had the dry clean bag quality and half of them were ripped just trying to get them over your head.
customer_reviews.author: meme

customer_reviews.title: Better than dollar store ones
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our trip to Costa Rica. It worked perfectly. They smell a little but it held up nicely. We still have them. after the rain we actually tied them around our waist so we wouldn't be too hot while hiking. Obviously not too tight as to rip.
customer_reviews.author: Kario

customer_reviews.title: Ponchos
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set of rain ponchos for us to keep in our vehicles just case of an unexpected downpour. These are adult sized and do provide decent coverage. Very pleased with this set. I did receive one purple and one neutral as pictured..
customer_reviews.author: J.C.Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing, cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: I gotta say, these are pretty cheaply made. It's kinda like those paper gowns they give you when you go to the doctor's office for a physical exam. I thought the whole thing would rip apart when I went to unbutton it. I wouldn't smoke in this for sure!
customer_reviews.author: pandora80

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. Sized for an average person, won't fit an XL male
customer_reviews.author: D. McNeish

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for afternoon showers at the amusement park! We used them multiple times. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Scrapper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the product I was looking for and it's what I got.
customer_reviews.author: lloydl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used them for outdoor festival and very comfortable and didn’t sweat in these like most ponchos.
customer_reviews.author: KelseyMaton

customer_reviews.title: She very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: Another item that I purchased for my 86 yr. old mother. She very happy with them. Likes the purple one especially.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice product but disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: the reason it got 3 stars is because it will only fit a woman no larger than a size 16-18. Wasn't in the description of the product. They'll probably put on one there by the time you read this...
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but buttons didn’t work on one
customer_reviews.text: The buttons didn’t work on one of them but it was fine. Good ponchos. Lasted through a lot of wears.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight raincoat.
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight raincoat. Handy, keeps you dry but will tear easily if it snags on anything.
customer_reviews.author: konacoffeebean

customer_reviews.title: ... in the rainforest of Costa Rica and they were perfect! Very durable and covered us when it started ...
customer_reviews.text: We used this for our honeymoon in the rainforest of Costa Rica and they were perfect! Very durable and covered us when it started raining unexpectedly.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough for a tween!
customer_reviews.text: Affordable product. Having 2 makes life just that easy for always being handy.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We used them in disney and they worked pretty well...
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Hegyi

customer_reviews.title: did the job
customer_reviews.text: took on our cruise to Central America, came in very handy when it poured down. a little small for us, we weren't able to close completely.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, effective protection from storms.
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly on our trip to Disney World, even in a thunderstorm.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fulmer

customer_reviews.title: Rain Jackets
customer_reviews.text: I have received them and they look durable! I will rerate them once I've worn them. Love the color!
customer_reviews.author: Bethena Smith

customer_reviews.title: Better that the cape like ones I
customer_reviews.text: Big rain poncho. Better that the cape like ones I think
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Good price. It's better than the ponchos that are ...
customer_reviews.text: As pictured. Good price. It's better than the ponchos that are basically just plastic trash bags with a hole for your head. These have sleeves which is nice. The purple is lovely
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tears easily. Great for single use
customer_reviews.text: A bit of a snug fit. I’m 6’3 230lbs. Not a lot of extra room. Tears easily. Great for single use
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and quality
customer_reviews.text: Took these babies to the jungle in Costa Rica and they worked really well. They also packed small for the trip making them easy for carry.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Lind

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Disney and they did the job perfect. Even had to use one for a stroller cover when our stroller cover failed. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Angel  P St.Louis

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell. They fit well (large enough) with ...
customer_reviews.text: Time will tell. They fit well (large enough) with long sleeves and a longer body than most. Seem flexible.
customer_reviews.author: dwmc

customer_reviews.title: ... be taking these ponchos on vacation and they look nice and I think they will work well
customer_reviews.text: I'll be taking these ponchos on vacation and they look nice and I think they will work well. Lightweight and the fit is nice - easier on/off than a typical poncho. The reason for only 4 stars was that one of the ponchos was obviously taken out, tried on, rolled into a ball, and stuffed into a plastic bag (a wrinkled mess). The other poncho was neatly folded and in its original sealed packaging. I expected both of them to be brand new. I would never have purchased it in a retail shop looking like that.
customer_reviews.author: val

customer_reviews.title: These are great. Too small for me
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Too small for me, I am 6'2" and 260 lbs, but for my Oaks guests, this saved the day... solid material
customer_reviews.author: RickM

customer_reviews.title: Thin... but a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great Buy! Got these for a trip to Washington DC. They said it was going to rain. Didn't have to use it on the trip, but I've used it around "Sunny" south Florida and it works great. A little thinner than I would've liked, but it does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: TonicShopper

customer_reviews.title: Rain Ponchos were perfect.
customer_reviews.text: These rain ponchos were perfect. We took them to Costa Rica. They were easy to use and covered most of our clothing, even with a backpack, during some pretty rainy weather. The sleeves were long enough to pull in our hands to keep them dry and out of the cold wind. Some of the people in our group had cheap ponchos. The wind whipped holes through them in seconds. Our were durable enough to make the trip home so we can reuse them.
customer_reviews.author: CZ

product_meta.title: PAXCOO 2 Pcs Reusable Rain Poncho with Hood and Sleeves for Adults
product_meta.description:
Product Description:

The rain gear from Paxcoo is a portable set with 2 pack in 2 different colors. One size suits most people. And it is made of durable waterproof EVA material, protecting you from getting wet when going out in a rainy day. 

Features:

Size: 145 * 70 cm

Material: EVA

Color: White, purple

Package Includes:

- 1 * White rain poncho

- 1 * Purple rain poncho


Customer Service:

If you have any problem of our product, you can click “seller contact” button in your Amazon account to email us. we would be delighted to help you and we will reply as soon as we can.

Product Warranty:

48 days money-back & 24-month warranty. Any questions you have, please don't hesitate to contact us. If you like our product, click Add to Cart to get it.
feature_bullets: ONE SIZE FITS MOST – Come with 2 waterproof raincoats in size 57 by 27.6 inches, in color white and purple, fits most women and men
HOODED RAIN COAT WITH SLEEVES – Attached drawstring hood and long sleeves, plastic snap closure type, for quick protection from a downpour, keep our rainwear handy
DURABLE & PORTABLE – Made of 0.13mm thicker EVA material, without smell, sturdy, but lightweight, easily fits in tool kit or travel backpacks
MULTIPLE USES – A good emergency set for outdoor activities, suitable for theme parks, rainy days, water rides, camping and hiking, etc.
PRODUCT WARRANTY AND CUSTOMER SERVICE - We provide 48-day money-back and 24-month warranty. So feel free to contact us if you have any question
